snippet: Some New York City apps encourage the wanderlust in users instead of directing them to the shortest route between two points.
abstract: App City column on Wanderous, free iPhone mapping app that plots wandering, interest-filled routes in New York City between start and end points entered by user.
lead_paragraph: Some New York City apps encourage the wanderlust in users instead of directing them to the shortest route between two points.

headline.print_headline: Daring to Take Long Way Home
headline.seo: Exploring a Longer Route Between Point A and Point B
headline.main: Daring to Take the Long Way Home
